About.paragraph: Grandmaster Lee and his son, Master Alex Lee, have spent decades developing a program to train martial arts for all ages. At our school of martial arts, we teach students life long self-defense techniques, stressing the importance of fitness. With a positive attitude and dedication, everyone is able to achieve a black belt in martial arts
